## Pages
- [About Us](/about): Learn about our mission, vision, and expert providers at Oasis Health Services. Bringing a fresh perspective to mental health care.
- [ADHD Testing & Management](/services/adhd-testing-and-management): Specialized ADHD evaluation and treatment for attention, impulsivity, and executive function concerns in adolescents and adults.
- [Anxiety Disorders](/conditions/anxiety-disorders): Get support for anxiety disorders including GAD, social anxiety, panic disorder, and phobias. Learn symptoms, treatment options, and how to schedule care
- [Autism Assessment & Management](/services/autism-assessment-and-management): Confirm or rule out ASD, map strengths and support needs, and create a practical plan for home, school, and work.
- [Blog](/blog): Explore articles on mental health, wellness, and personal growth from the experts at Oasis Health Services.
- [Comprehensive Psychiatric Assessment & Diagnosis](/services/comprehensive-psychiatric-assessment): A thorough first appointment to understand your symptoms, history, and goals, leading to a diagnosis and initial care plan.
- [Conditions We Treat](/conditions): Explore the mental health conditions we treat, including anxiety, depression, bipolar disorder, ADHD, OCD, PTSD, personality disorders, and psychotic disorders. Learn about care options and next steps.
- [Consent, Notices & Policies](/policies): Review our HIPAA Notice of Privacy Practices and Telehealth Informed Consent to understand how your medical information is used and your rights.
- [Contact Us](/contact): Get in touch with Oasis Health Services. We
- [For Patients](/patients): Get started with Oasis Health Services. Complete our secure assessment, schedule your visit, and access patient resources.
- [For Providers](/providers): Partner with Oasis Health Services. We work with physicians and specialists to coordinate care and improve patient outcomes.
- [Frequently Asked Questions](/patients/faqs): Find answers to common questions about our mental health services, insurance, appointments, and more.
- [Genetic Testing](/services/genetic-testing): Utilizing validated genetic insights to inform safer and more effective medication choices for your treatment.
- [Medication Management](/services/medication-management): Personalized psychiatric medication plans with regular follow-up for depression, anxiety, ADHD, and mood disorders.
- [Mental Health Care](/): Expert mental health care tailored for you, combining psychiatric and primary care for whole-person healing. Covered by insurance.
- [Mood Disorders](/conditions/mood-disorders): Learn about mood disorders such as depression, bipolar disorder, and dysthymia. Understand symptoms, evaluation, and treatment options including medication management.
- [Neurodevelopmental Disorders](/conditions/neurodevelopmental-disorders): Learn about ADHD and neurodevelopmental conditions affecting attention, learning, and social communication. Explore evaluation and treatment options for teens and adults.
- [Obsessive-Compulsive and Related Disorders](/conditions/ocd-related-disorders): Learn about OCD and related disorders including intrusive thoughts, compulsions, body dysmorphic disorder, and hoarding disorder. Explore treatment options and next steps.
- [Personality Disorders](/conditions/personality-disorders): Understand personality disorders and how they impact relationships and daily life. Learn about symptoms, evaluation, and treatment approaches.
- [Provider Referrals](/providers/referrals): Refer your patients to Oasis Health Services for comprehensive mental health care and psychiatric services.
- [Psychotic Disorders](/conditions/psychotic-disorders): Learn about psychotic disorders including schizophrenia and schizoaffective disorder. Review symptoms, evaluation, treatment options, and when to seek urgent help.
- [Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM)](/services/remote-patient-monitoring): Secure digital monitoring (e.g., blood pressure) between visits to support proactive care adjustments and follow-up.
- [Services](/services): Explore our comprehensive mental health services, including psychiatric assessments, therapy, medication management, ADHD and autism assessment, Spravato® therapy, telehealth, and remote patient monitoring.
- [Spravato® (esketamine) Therapy](/services/spravato): FDA-approved Spravato® (esketamine) nasal spray therapy for adults with treatment-resistant depression, administered in-office.
- [Start Now](/start): Begin your journey to better mental health. Complete our secure assessment and take the first step toward wellness with Oasis Health Services.
- [Substance Use Disorder Treatment](/services/substance-use-disorder-treatment): Integrated, harm-reduction oriented care with therapy, medication support, and recovery planning for substance use disorders.
- [Substance-Related and Addictive Disorders](/conditions/substance-related-disorders): Learn about substance-related and addictive disorders and how they affect health and life roles. Explore evaluation, treatment options, and integrated mental health support.
- [Telehealth & Digital Care](/services/telehealth): Secure virtual psychiatric care with flexible access and structured digital follow-up between appointments.
- [Terms & Conditions](/terms-and-conditions): Read the Terms and Conditions for using the services of Oasis Health Services.
- [Therapy & Counseling](/services/therapy-and-counseling): Evidence-based talk therapies designed to reduce symptoms, build skills, and improve daily functioning.
- [Trauma and Stress-Related Disorders](/conditions/trauma-stress-disorders): Learn about trauma- and stress-related disorders including PTSD, acute stress disorder, and adjustment disorders. Understand symptoms and treatment options.
